author: rdonkin
msg: Added Gabriele Carcassi to contributors list

author: rdonkin
msg: Allows exception throwing for mismatches to be switch on. Patch contributed by Gabriele Carcassi.

author: skitching
msg: Fix problem with parse(File) method when file is an absolute path on
a Windows machine. Solution provided by John Taylor (see bugzilla #28739)

author: skitching
msg: New test cases demonstrate that the substitution code can be used to
provide variable features also present in the Ant tool. Thanks to
Reid M. Pinchback for the patch (see bugzilla 31207).
